docs.abstract: Article on Nassau County Medical Center's Childhood Obesity Program, which is been described as 'probably the country's most successful' by J F Wilkinson, author of Don't Raise Your Child to Be a Fat Adult; Dr Platon J Collipp, chief of pediatrics at center, comments; illus (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: EAST MEADOW R. PLATON J. COLLIPP gets right to the point when he meets with young patients in the Nassau County Medical Center's Childhood Obesity Program.
docs.snippet: EAST MEADOW R. PLATON J. COLLIPP gets  right to the point when he meets with young patients in the Nassau County Medical  Center's Childhood Obesity Program.
